/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the blend of traditional and modern styles that characterizes Beijing. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. Trees and streetlights dot the landscape, adding to the urban charm of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being immersed in the city's daily life.
